name: 林水泉
objective: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。一維及多維穩定態熱傳導及非穩定態熱傳導、對流原理、強迫對流及自然對流經驗和實驗關係式、輻射熱傳遞、凝結與沸騰、熱交換器、熱傳遞中的特殊論題。
schedule:
週次	講授內容概要	                           課本章節
1~2	Introduction	                           Chapter 1
3~4	Steady-State Conduction one Dimension	Chapter 2
5~6	Steady-State Conduction Multiple Dimensions	Chapter 3
7~8	Unsteady-state Conduction	                  Chapter 4
9	期中考
10~11    Principle of Convection	                  Chapter 5
12~13   Empirical and Practical Relations for Forced-Convection     Heat Transfer	                                    Chapter 6
14~15   Natural Convection Systems	                  Chapter 7
16      Radiation Heat Transfer                        Chapter 8
17      Condensation and Boiling ＆ Heat Exchanges     Chapter 9、10
18      期末考
scorePolicy: 作業與平時出席佔30％，期中考佔30％，期末考佔40％
materials:
教科書及參考書目
“Heat Transfer,” Tenth Ed, J.P.Holman
